metadata.subject: Lawyer for Susan Rice: Obama administration 'justifiably concerned' about sharing Intel with Trump team - POLITICO

relationships.description: Sender forwarding a news article to recipient
Susan Rice was part of the Obama administration

analysis.purpose: To share a news article about political intelligence sharing concerns between administrations
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political tensions during transition period between Obama and Trump administrations

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be straightforward sharing of news article

illegal_activity.description: Document is sharing a POLITICO news article about political concerns, not discussing first-hand illegal activity

details: Forwarding POLITICO news article about Susan Rice and intelligence sharing concerns

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be about publicly reported political tensions during the Trump administration transition, which received significant media coverage

analysis.summary: Steve Bannon forwards a POLITICO news article to an email address about Susan Rice's lawyer stating the Obama administration was 'justifiably concerned' about sharing intelligence with the Trump team, specifically mentioning Michael Flynn.
